CustomField.description: The default Nebula Logger implementation assumes that logging to Log__c via LogEntryEvent__e should occur. Uncheck to prevent Log__c and LogEntry__c records from being created.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The default Nebula Logger implementation assumes that logging to Log__c via LogEntryEvent__e should occur. Uncheck to prevent Log__c and LogEntry__c records from being created.
CustomField.label: Is Platform Event Publishing Enabled
